import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const CourseTypeThree = ({ data, classes, bgWhite }) => { return (
{data.level}
  • {data.lesson} Lessons
  • {data.duration}
{data.title}
({data.review} Review)
{ data.price === '0' ?
Free
:
${data.price}
} { data.oldPrice &&
${data.oldPrice}
}
  • {data.student} Students
) } export default CourseTypeThree;
